Package net.proteusframework.data.filesystem

Classes for accessing a generic filesystem.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileSystemEntityDataSource
    DataSource for file system entities.
    FileSystemEntityFilter
    A filter for FileSystemEntity objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndFilter
    Combine one or more filters together using an AND logical operator.
    CleanupVersionsRunnable
    Removes trashes file versions.
    DatabaseStreamStorage
    Implements stream storage using the DataSourceStreamManager which stores streams as chunks in a single table.
    DataSourceStreamManager
    AbstractStreamManager implementation that gets connections from a DataSource.
    DirectoryEntity
    Represents a directory.
    EmptyFileSystemEntityDataSource
    An empty datasource.
    FileEntity
    Represents a file.
    FileEntityBeanInfo
    Bean info for FileEntity.
    FileSystemDAO
    Defines operations for a filesystem that is designed for storing and serving HTTP content from multiple servers.
    FileSystemEntity
    Base class for file system objects.
    FileSystemEntityBeanInfo
    Bean info for FileSystemEntity.
    FileSystemEntityCapability
    Capability to control access to files and directories.
    FileSystemEntityComparators
    Various comparators for FileSystemEntities.
    FileSystemEntityDataSourceImpl
    Default implementation of FileSystemEntityDataSource.
    FileSystemEntityDeleteEventListener
    Listener that cleans up stream storage.
    FileSystemEntityNameComparator
    Compares FileSystemEntity objects by name.
    FileSystemEntityPostDeleteEventListener
    Listener that cleans up stream storage.
    FileSystemEntityTypeFilter<T extends FileSystemEntity>
    FileSystemEntity type limiting filter.
    FileSystemMetaData
    Meta data for a FileSystemEntity.
    FileSystemQRelayProcessor
    QRelay processor for file system operations.
    FileSystemUtil
    Utilities for the file system.
    FilterUtil
    Provides mechanisms to create filters.
    HibernateStreamStorageBeanInfo
    Bean info for DatabaseStreamStorage.
    HiddenFilter
    Filter to check for hidden attribute.
    NameEqFilter
    Filter that accepts a entity based on a name.
    NameInFilter
    FileSystemEntity name filter.
    NameLikeFilter
    Filter that accepts a entity based on a partial name using syntax for the SQL 'LIKE' operator.
    NativeStreamStorage
    Implements stream storage on the local disk using the native filesystem through File and related API.
    NegateFilter
    Negate the result of a filter.
    OrFilter
    Combine one or more filters together using an OR logical operator.
    SearchAndReplace
    Utility to search and replace content in filesystem entities.
    StreamStorage
    Defines an interface for storing streams that are related to FileEntity instances.
    StreamStorageChangeRequest
    Request for changing the stream storage module for a FileSystemEntity.
    TemporaryFileEntity
    Temporary FileEntity.
    TrashedFilter
    Filter for the FileSystemEntity.isEntityTrashed() property.
    ZipFileListDataSource
    Data source that represents a list of files as a single zip file.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FileEntity.CompressionType
    Compression types.
    FileSystemEntityCapabilityOperation
    The types of access for FileSystemEntities.
    FileSystemEntityCreateMode
    Creation mode.

Package net.proteusframework.data.filesystem Description
